docs.text: you'd think that after awhile hollywood would stop trying to make movies out of video games .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it hasn't worked so far .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: " street fighter ? "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: " super mario brothers ? "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: " wing commander ? "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: " mortal kombat ? "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: not a watchable film in the bunch .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: still i held out some hope for " tomb raider . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: after all , the game's premise is heavily influenced by the indiana jones trilogy and all the mummy movies , so there are cinematic elements imbedded in the concept .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: however , despite the potential of the project , " tomb raider " proves to be yet another bomb .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the plot is a convoluted accumulation of nonsense probably borrowed from a dozen bad movies .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: there's a once-ever-5000-years alignment of planets coming up , and the illuminati have to find both halves of an ancient triangle that controls time in order to take over the world .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: of course , the ancient folks who divided the triangle buried the halves in tombs on opposite sides of the world .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: our heroine , lady lara croft ( angelina jolie ) , finds the key that opens the tombs in relics that her dead father ( jon voight ) dug up .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: she figures that if she gets the triangle , she can bring her dad back from the dead .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: of course , no one was expecting much of a plot from this movie anyway .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: in both video games and action movies , the plot is just an excuse for the action sequences .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: however , the action in " tomb raider " shows little style or originality .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: there's lots of shooting and some kung fu fightin' , but none of it progresses beyond the level of a cheap direct-to-cable flick .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the other goofy archeologist flick of the summer , " the mummy returns , " was much better ; it had its flaws , but its action was creative and large-scale .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: since winning her academy award for " girl , interrupted , " jolie hasn't taken any projects that would display her acting talents .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: " tomb raider " seems to be more interested in displaying her breasts ; so much attention is drawn to them that it's a shame there's no oscar for best performance by a wonderbra .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: while we don't see much of her acting ability ( with the exception of a wonderful upper-crust british accent ) , we do get a hint of jolie's less savory side .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: considering the rumors of incest that hang over jolie and her supposed obsession with death , having lara be obsessed with resurrecting her dead father ( and uninterested in any of the living males around her ) seems a poor choice .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: having jolie's real life father jon voight play the dead dad makes it even creepier .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i haven't decided what to make of director simon west yet .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: his first feature was the star-studded disaster " con air , " but my opinion of him improved with " the general's daughter , " which was thick with sultry atmosphere .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: now this train wreck .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i hope he improves again because his next project is the big screen version of the cult tv series " the prisoner . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: hollywood has already screwed up " the avengers , " and " the prisoner " represents a chance for redemption .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: ( by the way , speaking of british tv , " red dwarf " fans should look for chris " rimmer " barrie in his first major film role ) .
docs.label: negative
